name: BAGSMART Makeup Bag for Women with Hanging Hook - Portable Cosmetic Case, Large Capacity Door Room Essentials Travel Organizer for Full Sized Cosmetics and Toiletries, Black
short_description: 【Large Capacity】: This makeup organizer measuring 11 x 6.1 x 8.86 inches. The spacious main compartment accommodates a wide range of cosmetics, travel-sized toiletries, and travel accessories, while two zippered side pockets offer additional storage options. The left side pocket is lined with stain-resistant fabric, perfect for storing makeup brushes, while the right side pocket is ideal for keeping curling irons, combs, and more.

【Convenient Design】: The inner pockets are equipped with elastic straps to securely hold bottles upright, and the transparent zipper pockets allow for easy visibility and access to items without the need to open them. The customized metal zipper closure ensures a smooth and effortless pull, while the 360-degree rotatable and foldable anti-slip metal hook offers versatile hanging options. Additionally, the top handle allows for convenient carrying.

【Easy to Use】: With 3 transparent pockets, this hanging makeup bag organizer makes it effortless to keep your essentials organized. The left side pocket features a stain-resistant PVC lining, which is tailored to store makeup brushes, powder puffs, sponges, and other items that require special consideration. The top and bottom transparent pockets provide additional storage space while ensuring easy accessibility to small items.

【High Quality】: Crafted from premium water-resistant polyester material, our makeup case boasts a soft and luxurious feel. The padded design not only preserves the bag's shape but also offers exceptional protection for your belongings. With reinforced stitching and heavy-duty materials, this organizer can easily withstand the weight of numerous items while remaining lightweight and incredibly durable.

【Multi-functional Makeup】: This portable hanging makeup bag is a multifunctional organizer bag that combines the functionality of a makeup bag and a travel toiletry bag. It is an excellent choice for a wide range of activities, from travel, business trips, fitness routines, and beach outings to picnics and home storage. It also makes for a perfect gift for ladies, friends, and family on special occasions such as birthdays, Christmas, and Valentine's Day.

short_description: TOILETRY BAG FOR MEN AND WOMEN - With 18 compartments that keep toiletries, grooming, shaving and cosmetics separated and easy to find. Size: 9.5 × 10.5 × 4 in (closed) and 9.5 × 21 × 4 in (open/hanging). With 18 compartments, this men's or women's toiletry travel bag fits travel-size and many full-size items like toothbrushes, razors, deodorant, shampoo, skincare and makeup, making it ideal for the whole family.

HANGING TOILETRY BAG - Hangs securely on towel rails, shower bars, mirrors, doors or hooks so everything stays visible and easy to reach. Designed for both men and women, it works as a reliable hanging travel toiletry bag for hotels, cruises, camping, RVs and shared bathrooms where counter space is limited.

TSA TOILETRY BAG - Includes a removable TSA-approved clear pouch for liquids and travel bottles, helping speed up security screening (TSA rules may vary). Detach the pouch for inspection, then reattach it inside the bag, making it more convenient than sewn-in clear pockets found on many travel toiletry bags and cosmetic organizers.

WATER-RESISTANT MAKEUP BAG - Made with premium durable water-resistant materials, reinforced stitching and a leak-resistant interior to help protect clothes inside your luggage. This versatile toiletries bag works as a wash bag for men and women, functions as a classic dopp kit or shaving kit for travel, and easily stores skincare, makeup, cosmetics, razors and everyday grooming essentials.

LIFETIME GUARANTEE - Designed to hang when possible or stand upright when there’s nowhere to hang it, this versatile bathroom bag adapts to different bathroom setups. Ideal for hotels, cruises, gym, camping and family trips, and backed by the VENTURE 4TH Lifetime Replacement Guarantee.
